additional_info:

v2.0.15: temporary fix for code blocks until a patch for Decent NERDZ Syntax Highlighting is added.
v2.0.14: fixed white hrs in comments. Thanks to Roxas Shadow
v2.0.13: fixed scrollbar not showing in code blocks
v2.0.12: fixed black codes. Sorry unsy :(

v2.0.10: fixed problems with code blocks.
